nodes.text: The area known as Warralokk was located on the planet Kashyyyk, in the Mid Rim's Mytaranor sector. Volunteers from Warralokk joined an army of Wookiees, Kashyyyk's native sentient species, that formed during the Clone Wars in order to defend the city of Kachirho in the Wawaatt Archipelago from the Separatist Droid Army with aid from the Grand Army of the Republic during the Battle of Kashyyyk in 19 BBY.

In the new Star Wars canon, Warralokk was mentioned in the third issue of De Agostini's Star Wars Bust Collection magazine series, which was published in 2021. The region originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the city of Warralokk was mentioned in a Databank entry on StarWars.com for the character Tarkov.
